committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to repeal the provisions which prevent annuity benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System or the Federal Employees' Retirement System from being garnished.

summary.text: Repeals provisions under the Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems which exempt the annuity benefits payable under such systems from garnishment or other legal processes to satisfy debts.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to repeal the provisions which prevent annuity benefits under the Civil Service Retirement System or the Federal Employees' Retirement System from being garnished.
